meanings.definition: A large cash prize in a game or lottery.
meanings.sent1: Winning the jackpot in the bingo game made Sarah very happy.
meanings.sent2: The slot machine displayed flashing lights when someone hit the jackpot.
meanings.sent3: The jackpot in the raffle was so big, it felt like a dream come true.
meanings.sent4: Her promotion at work was like hitting the jackpot in her career.
meanings.sent5: The jackpot at the end of the treasure hunt was a chest full of gold coins.

meanings.definition: The maximum amount of money that can be won in a casino game.
meanings.sent1: Players were excited to see who would hit the jackpot at the poker table.
meanings.sent2: The grand jackpot at the casino was a huge incentive for many gamblers.
meanings.sent3: Reaching the jackpot in the slot machine felt like reaching the peak of a mountain.
meanings.sent4: The jackpot in the high-stakes game was the ultimate goal for the players.
meanings.sent5: The jackpot prize in the casino was enough to change someone's life overnight.

meanings.definition: A large or unexpected success or reward.
meanings.sent1: His invention of the new gadget was a jackpot in the tech industry.
meanings.sent2: The team's victory in the championship was a jackpot for the underdogs.
meanings.sent3: Finding a parking spot right in front of the store was a small jackpot for Sarah.
meanings.sent4: Her discovery of the rare flower species was a jackpot for the botanist.
meanings.sent5: The surprise party thrown by her friends was a social jackpot for Sarah.
